entity.name: ECT TEST - New York set to ease coronavirus restrictions

text:
@SenSchumer Primary Public Health responsibility lies w/ cities/counties,  state. NY failed horribly: 

NY has only 5.7% of US population but 34% of all US COVID-19 deaths. NYC Subways clearly propagated virus into/out-of NYC. 

You, Cuomo, De Blasio are monsters.

https://t.co/Igbts4ztqc
